monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Pulls player towards a grappling anchor
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Ballistics
skills.description: This Monster deals 25% more damage, but has a 10% chance to miss each hit.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 25% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), gain 8 Charge stacks. (Once per attack)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Curse Breaker
skills.description: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 275% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 340% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 425% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 530% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fiery Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Flurry of Blows
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Forge
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (500 + 80% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Forge Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 100% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Fortress
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (350 + 30% Defense) Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Lucky Hit
skills.description: Critical Hits have a 17% chance to deal 77% more damage.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Napalm
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Pyro Cracker
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Pyro Cracker Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Pyro Cracker Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Rocket Launch
skills.description: 3 x 110% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) or Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Severe Hit
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Armor Break (Debuff) and a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Shocking Hit
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Shock (Debuff) and a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Variety
skills.description: Every attack deals 15% increased damage when used for the first time during combat. (Different levels count as same attack)

skills.name: Warcast
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Warcast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Warcast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Wonder Potion
skills.description: Aura: Potions also remove 4 Debuffs from the target and add 4 random Buffs. (2 for multi-target Items)

skills.name: Worm Troop
skills.description: Aura: Worms in the party regenerate 10% of their Max Health each turn and have +10% Mana Regeneration.

drops.name: Cookie Mushroom
drops.description: Increases damage, healing and shielding of this monster by 3%.
